Dracona waited for them to leave....then went into the secret passage way
underground to the real base....the real base, looking nowhere near as
glamorous as the fake one, not even half complete..... "well, the real base
can stay underground, they can't find it now..." Dracona said....Plintissa
climbed through a secret chute where no one could see and grabbed the
Radicons in her tentacles, firing at BH, she ran around in a confusing
pattern and disappeared..one Radicon was missing..... "great, that idiot
Fighter is still up there!....." Dracona said...plintissa sighed, her and
dracona went back up (where no one could see) and searched for Scamrock, who
was still battling some of the attackers.......
----- Original Message -----
From: <KSLawdogg@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Saturday, May 27, 2000 10:21 PM
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


> (TheCode, my charges aren't impossible to dodge.  You had Scamrock grab
them,
> which would cause them to explode because of impact.  That was your
mistake
> by doing that.  Also, I read in a few posts that the People's Base
exploded,
> I didn't see the actual post where it exploded, and I never saw your
'sister'
> , but evidently since I didn't get the e-mail, you can't blame me)
>
> The Oblitercons (Oblitertron)/Nemesis Enforcer/Anubis/Hades/Unitron/Koga
> Shuko/Scattershot:
>
> Oblitertron raised both of his arms in triumph, splitting into five
seperate
> pieces, each transforming into a robot, the Oblitercons landing in a line.
>
> Dark One: "Alright, the base is crushed, this...Dracona's base is in
> ruins...her forces are destroyed."
>
> Breakdown: "I think Nemesis called for reinforcements."
>
> Pyro: "Then let's fire a few shots off and pull back to re-energize."
>
> Hiss: "Yes, let's."
>
> Scavenger raised his missile launcher, firing a rocket off at Scamrock,
the
> other Oblitercons charging off towards the Alliance base, not really
caring
> about finishing them off, leaving Nemesis and Scattershot alone with the f
our
> Newcomers.
> -------------
> Nemesis Enforcer fired two optic blasts at the People's base's rubble,
> turning, a clawed fist sending him slamming into a trunk.  Anubis grabbed
him
> by the neck, kneeing him in the face twice, backhanded him with claws.
> -------------
> Scattershot fired off twenty explosive bullets down randomly at the
Radicons,
> deciding he really didn't enjoy them without a bomb, he'd have to go bumb
> some off other people.  Raising an 'eyebrow', he fired off ten shots,
Anubis
> slamming into a tree, the tree hitting the ground.  Landing to the ground,
> his side aching from previous wounds, he didn't spot Unitron from behind,
six
> laser bolts tearing into the Alliance member's back, sending him crashing
to
> the ground.
> ------------
> "Excellent, Unitron.  Let's move out!  Hades, grab Anubis.  It's time to
get
> rejuvinated.  The people here shouldn't hinder our plans, their base is
> destroyed."  Unitron ordered, Hades picking Anubis up, the Newcomers
heading
> back towards their downed ship to recieve repairs.
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------

> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
>
